# AdReactor

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="728"
  height="90"
  type="adreactor"
  data-pid="790"
  data-zid="9"
  data-custom3="No Type"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-pid`
-   `data-zid`
-   `data-custom3`
